header.title: Precise Similar Topics II
header.description:
This MOD will display a list of similar/related topics at the bottom of the current topic being viewed by matching keywords in the current topic's title with other topic titles in your board's forums.
Based on a very old 'Similar Topics' MOD written by tas2580 that was later modified by Xabi into 'Precise Similar Topics' with a lighter and more precise query, my 'Precise Similar Topics II' is a complete rewrite that takes this MOD all the way to a complete, customizable, efficient and pretty implementation for your phpBB board.
header.author-notes:
REQUIREMENTS: Your database must be using MySQL 4.0.1 or higher. The phpbb_topics table storage engine must be MyISAM (this is the default table type for most MySQL databases). The install script will test your database to see if it meets these requirement and notify you if this MOD will be compatible with your phpBB board.
NOTE: Similar Topics is off by default. Visit the ACP/.MODs section after installation to turn it on.
